featured.text: In Samoa a woman is not considered attractive unless she weighs more than 200 pounds.

definition.zh_def: 薩摩亞，位於南太平洋的一個島國，由兩個主要島嶼和多個小島組成。
definition.en_def: Samoa is an island nation located in the South Pacific, consisting of two main islands and several smaller islets.
definition.example: Samoa is known for its beautiful beaches and rich cultural heritage.
